website_summaries.verdict: A good quality starter tool set for canning to help you get the food in the cans and the cans out of the water easily.
pros: Funnel fits both small and large mouthed jars
These tools are made specifically for canning
Eliminates the need to improvise ways to lift jars out of hot water without burning yourself
cons: No pot included with this set

customer_reviews.title: Timer is defective...
customer_reviews.text: Great set but I knocked off one star because of the timer, I threw it away it was so bad. When you hit the button to add minutes the screen goes blank for about 10 seconds but it does eventually come back so you can see the time. You'd have to count the number of times you hit the minute button, then wait about 10-30 seconds for the timer screen to be readable, and when I hit start I don't trust it, pretty much trash. But the set without the timer is still worth the money, look for a timer somewhere else...
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hardwick

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect set for beginning canners like myself
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect set for beginning canners like myself. I didn't end up using the lid screw-on tool, but everything else I used! The only extra tool I'd say you'd need to have is a good ladle for spooning your goods into the funnel. The timer even came with a battery! This set is perfect and is ready to go right when you get it out of the box!
customer_reviews.author: tdown22

customer_reviews.title: so it's useless. There is no headroom measurement tool
customer_reviews.text: The timer does not make any sound, so it's useless. There is no headroom measurement tool. The jar lifter's hinges are stiff and require two hands to use. The tongs are uncomfortable to use; I assume the tong handles were designed not for functionality, but so they could easily fit in the box. Overall, it seems poorly designed and cheaply manufactured.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Smith

customer_reviews.title: Durable Canning Set
customer_reviews.text: Great little starter combo. Have used it a lot the past few months, and it's all holding together, no quality issues. Has everything you need to help move hot canning jars and their lids. The magnet (on the lid lifter) is a good strength to securely remove lids from hot water after boiling, but not so much you have to struggle to remove the lid from the tool and end up contaminating the lid in the process. Good kit at a fair price. Update: We've canned hundreds of jars to include meats, fruits, vegetables and dairy. No melting concerns whatsoever. These have held up to canning and dishwasher cleaning great. Definitely recommend as a good starter canning kit.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: I love this set! I canned for the first time alone and this worked wonderful. I really did not need the timer and wish the end of the magnet had a little measurer on the end to measure head space in the jars but my mom says the more you can the easier it gets to eyeball the amount. I would recommend this to friends and family!
customer_reviews.author: George Short

customer_reviews.title: Beginners!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ugh! I was so nervous to order this because this is my first time canning so I had no idea what was going to be a good start for me, BUT when I received it, I was so happy! It’s heavy duty! Not cheap nonsense! I’m super happy! Great for beginners!!
customer_reviews.author: shelby c.

customer_reviews.title: Great accessories
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to use my newly purchased canner. Love the little timer. The big tongs make it so easy to lift out the hot jars from the canner. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jenean C.

customer_reviews.title: Good Set, Exceeded Expectations
customer_reviews.text: This set exceeded expectations. Based on the picture I thought I'd get cheap plastic utensils. Instead they are quality heat-rated rubber coated utensils, same as the other sets for sale. The utensils seem quite strong/robust and very capable. The timer is an added feature that most other sets do not come with. My wife especially likes the timer - it is magnetic and sticks to our fridge. She can be cooking a meal and using the oven timer, and can also be canning and using the canning timer.
customer_reviews.author: C. Meier

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I am new to canning and I recently bought the Granite Wear canner. We have used it 5 different times to can a variety of garden products and it has worked well each time. I also bought the Presto 09995 7 Function Canning Kit and have found the items in this kit, to be super helpful. I would suggest buying a book about canning (I bought the Balls Blue Book) I would recommend this canner for anyone looking to start canning.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Must for canning
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect. I did 8 cans of peaches and lend it to my mom. Its really sturdy, tolerated the boiling temperature and súper handy. I will be buying one for my mom. The only thing missing is the metal base, which you can get at any store or here in Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Ivi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to get me started canning
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set several years ago and have been faithfully using it every year for hot bath canning. It was great to get all the essentials in one box.
customer_reviews.author: BobbieJo

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: This is a DEFINITE must have if you plan to can. I haven't had any trouble with any of the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Jumel

customer_reviews.title: works great, and has the most products of the other ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, works great, and has the most products of the other kits we saw for canning. I just wish there was a bubble/measuring tool. the magnet is meant for that, but using the magnet to pull clean lids out and then using that tool to remove air bubbles is not effective as the tool must be washed in between every single jar. If you purchase this--and I highly recommend this kit--I do suggest purchasing a separate tool of measure head length and to remove air bubbles.
customer_reviews.author: CynD-S

customer_reviews.title: very happy
customer_reviews.text: Well made product. Pleasure to use, all items easy to handle. Digital timer a nice surprise and very useful
customer_reviews.author: wayne C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for canning. Perfect set for beginners that watch videos
customer_reviews.text: Wish it all came separate. Only needed a few of the items for canning but works great
customer_reviews.author: Kaley

customer_reviews.title: Partial review. Have only used part of the gadgets.
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat on the flimsy side. Have only used the timer, tongs, and funnel. So far those work great. Love these so far.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Nice canning kit
customer_reviews.text: A nice canning kit that gives you everything you need to can your favorite foods. The only thing I don't like is that the timer, while it works very well, doesn't have an on/off switch. Once you put the batteries in the unit is "on". To turn it "off" you have to remove the batteries. It's just a minor inconvenience and it's not enough to stop me from giving this kit 5 stars, but I would've designed it differently.
customer_reviews.author: J. M.

customer_reviews.title: Best Starter Set
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great starter set. I love the grip on the items and they are good quality. It has really lasted over the past 2 years. I haven't even seen a need to replace anything. If you are a first timer, like me, and need to get started this is the kit to buy. Also get the Ball Complete Book of Home Preserving this will have all the instructions you need for hot and cold canning along with just about any recipe you could want for canning anything!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle V. Beckham

customer_reviews.title: We're great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Great for beginners. Quality is ok. When you can as much as we do you find that most of these tools aren't needed and you can do most of everything with insulated gloves and a towel. I still do use these from time to time but sometimes you don't even want to bother with the tools.
customer_reviews.author: mnc06002

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set of tools for novice and experienced canners!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't canned for 30 years, so all the old tools are gone. Purchased this set, very pleased with the quality of the items. Can lifter is fantastic, much better than old one I had. Must have for the serious canners, and very fair price. The timer is overkill, most ovens, microwaves, phones, etc now have timers on them.
customer_reviews.author: NPR MANTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: TRULEY NEEDED
customer_reviews.text: I SURE DID NEED THESE TOOLS FOR MY JAM MAKING. THEY ARE WELL WORTH THE MONEY
customer_reviews.author: BEVERLY

customer_reviews.title: Just Right for a Canning Newbie
customer_reviews.text: This set was exactly what I needed when I jumped off the deepend and started canning and preserving. The pieces are dishwasher safe, so cleaning them is a breeze, and I store them inside my canning pot. The only piece in the set that I don't use is the tongs, but even withthat I feel like this was a great value for what I got. The lid lifter/bubble popper is a particularly great tool. I'd recommend this set to anyone looking to start canning!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Hardegree

customer_reviews.title: Good for Starters
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in order to have the proper gear for a canning class. The first words out of the teachers mouth "Don't buy one of the canning kits!" She tried to warn us off saying that the quality was suspect, but everything seems pretty good to me. I gave it 4-stars instead of 5 because the funnel did scratch up pretty quickly in the dishes. I plan on upgrading to a stainless funnel. All and all, this set is a good value and you can always trade up if you get serious about canning.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas P. Fillhart

customer_reviews.title: Great set for canning
customer_reviews.text: This set is great for most of your canning needs. Everything is brightly colored and looks nice. The only complaint I have is that the timer never worked, straight out of the box. It wasn't a big enough deal to me to bother with trying to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jac

customer_reviews.title: ... not planning on getting this item but it was recommended in a package deal
customer_reviews.text: Was not planning on getting this item but it was recommended in a package deal. Was glad I decided to add it. Found out after the cooker arrived I would need these items to do some canning. Well constructed and I have used it twice while canning, all items work well. If you are getting into canning this is a great starter kit
customer_reviews.author: Donald Moss

customer_reviews.title: Has made me interested in other ways to preserve food
customer_reviews.text: My first go at canning. Found these items very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Waters

customer_reviews.title: Nice to use handling jars when hot
customer_reviews.text: Great to use. Not quiet as strong as the older ones
customer_reviews.author: C J - Indianapolis

customer_reviews.title: Great set for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Just recently started canning and this is my very first canning utensils set. I was very happy with everything. All the pieces worked as promised and everything washed up well in the dishwasher. I'm not sure if it's supposed to be dishwasher safe, but I have used these and washed them that way quite a few times now and everything is just like new.
customer_reviews.author: Krystin McKim

customer_reviews.title: Good Set
customer_reviews.text: I've used everything except the jar wrench, which I'll probably never use, and it's all worked great. The timer is a little annoying in that it beeps for every minute/second change when setting, and you can only go up with time setting i.e. if you need exactly 15 minutes and you accidentally set it for 16, you have to start back at zero, but it works and it's nice and loud when it goes off.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Nice bundle
customer_reviews.text: This is OK to use for canning. I wish the magnet stick had measurements on it for measuring the head space on the jars. The time is cheap and I had to tape it closed - but it works. Nice to have things in a bundle.
customer_reviews.author: MCL

customer_reviews.title: Presto Canning Kit
customer_reviews.text: The wife loves it. I have nothing else to say about this product except for one thing. Yesterday, We had a honey jar with a lid that would not budge. I tried the hot water, the tapping, the spoon, everything. Nothing worked. The wife suggested the opener included with this kit. I thought, no it will bend the opener and not open the jar. I was wrong, it worked and did not bend. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Va Trail Rider

customer_reviews.title: Piece of "you-know-what". The tongs couldn't even pick up ...
customer_reviews.text: Piece of "you-know-what". The tongs couldn't even pick up a quart sized jar out of boiling hot water bath with two hands & multiple tries. You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.author: Save money on Amazon so we can afford to shop locally too :)

customer_reviews.title: Great for my Needs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I give canned stuff away as Christmas gifts - Mainly salsa, pesto, and candied jalapenos - and I got tired of using the wrong tools :-) I'm an amateur canner, but this set is perfect for my relatively small canning needs (30-50 half-pints a year). The tongs and the jar wrench weren't anything that I needed, but the rest is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos J

customer_reviews.title: Love these tools
customer_reviews.text: When I started pressure canning I had to have some extra tools. I had a funnel which I used for the waterbed canning, but that was a bit of an old one. This kit contains the right tools to start you off.
customer_reviews.author: Marcel

customer_reviews.title: Great Set for the Right price. Should replace timer with headspace gauge.
customer_reviews.text: The funnel, lid wrench, magnet/air tool, and jar grabber are essentials. The timer is pretty useless. I mean, who doesn't have a kitchen timer (or 4) already? This kit would be much better served by having a headspace gauge, which is the one additional thing I've had to buy.
customer_reviews.author: BJH888

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: We can pickles and fish. This kit has some useful items for a good price. All of the components are of good quality except the jar lifter is a bit small for anything larger than small mouth jars. However, you can use them with both hands to lift wide mouth jars. Given the price and good quality, I ended up buying three of these for our use and as gifts for family members.
customer_reviews.author: M. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Useful tools
customer_reviews.text: I hope this is helpful for my daughter in law who is learning how to garden and can. It is definitely nice to have tools that help keep the mess to a minimum and be a little safer as well.
customer_reviews.author: T. L. Wi

customer_reviews.title: Priced right
customer_reviews.text: Useful set. Used it all summer and into early fall with no problems. Should last several years.
customer_reviews.author: V. WELCH

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: These are essential tools needed for any type of canning, water bath or pressure cooker canners. Home canners cannot go wrong with this item. The tools are sturdy. The wide mouth funnel is exactly what is needed and the added bonus of the electronic timer that does not come with more expensive sets is icing on the cake.
customer_reviews.author: LadyLisetta

customer_reviews.title: Cleans up easy
customer_reviews.text: I had no issues with anything from this set! Did everything i needed it to do!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems to sturdy. Haven't field tested it as of it but doesn't seem like cheap BS.
customer_reviews.author: CaveatEmptor

customer_reviews.title: Item as described
customer_reviews.text: Awesome kit for canning. We lost a couple items out of the kit and just repurchased the kit. Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.author: Jason Carnahan

customer_reviews.title: Everything the beginner needs
customer_reviews.text: I used my kit for the first time last night and I must say, it contains everything you need. I did my first canning project last night (dill pickles) and everything worked our great. I hate that the time doesn't have an on/off switch. Other than that, this kit is worth the money especially for a beginner like me.
customer_reviews.author: Monique B

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set. Contained everything I needed in terms of utensils to start canning. The timer is a nice addition that most sets don't have. It's pretty cool, very simple and not overly complicated, even a child or elderly person not comfortable with electronics could figure this timer out.
customer_reviews.author: Sonita Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy this for the Timer. Great Products Otherwise
customer_reviews.text: Loving these accessories for helping me when I am canning! The timer died very early on. But the other products are very durable and holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Serena S.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my mother, who has recently started to learn how to can and doesn't quite have any equipment for it. As a beginner, she says it has been extremely useful for starting out and learning.
customer_reviews.author: CiCi

customer_reviews.title: Great canning accessories, nice color easy to find and clean.
customer_reviews.text: Really like the wide mouth funnel. Handy timer I use when my regular cooking timers being used concurrently.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: this set is great.
customer_reviews.text: Most of the items in this kit are useable when I can. It's plastic and so a few I prefer to use my metal pieces to complete the task, but for the money, this set is great.
customer_reviews.author: Just another Jo(anna)

customer_reviews.title: Good quality:price ratio.
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a complete set of canning tools. While I wish the timer had an on/off button, I've read that the LCD screen draws negligible power. Works exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit for a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need to help you get started. I am sure you will add more items later, but this kit gives you everything you need to get up and running. So, save yourself some time AND money and buy this kit that has all of the most common items in one package.
customer_reviews.author: TurkeyMan

customer_reviews.title: Very good value for money.
customer_reviews.text: Got this on sale, it is a great value for money kit. We had never canned a single thing until a couple of weeks back and I can see exactly why kits like this exist. The only thing we did not use was the timer, it is a nice quality timer but we already had one in use.
customer_reviews.author: AJWKM

customer_reviews.title: Time doesn't matter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a bundle package to go along with an All American canner. Very happy with the canner, but I bought the package way before I harvested a deer and was able to use them. When I was ready to can some venison and use these tools the timer did not work. I could not get it to set to zero and it would count down from 99 to 89 seconds and then start over at 99. By the time I used it, the window for returning items had expired. The other tools are very useful and work great, but throw the timer away when you get it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen McFerrin

customer_reviews.title: Great canning kit
customer_reviews.text: Everything works great in this set and I have used it many times. The only negative is that the timer is so easy to use that my kids keep stealing it from my fridge. I use the timer all of the time even when I'm not canning and the fact that it is magnetic on the back is a huge plus.
customer_reviews.author: T. Justice

customer_reviews.title: Perfect kit for Canning
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need for canning accessories. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Mini J

customer_reviews.title: Every tool you need to start canning
customer_reviews.text: I love this set, I didn't have to buy anything else to immediately start pressure canning!
customer_reviews.author: RHarrison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little kit for canning
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little kit for canning. It has everything we needed to can and the funnel is a lifesaver! So much better than spooning it in and making a mess everywhere. Great price and a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: GOOD QUALLITY
customer_reviews.text: PRESTO YOU DID IT AGAIN, I HAD ONE SMALL PROBLEM I HAD TO REMOVE THE BACK FROM THE TIMER AND REALIGN THE LITTLE HINGE PIN THAT WAS NOT IN PLACE
customer_reviews.author: Huntinhog

customer_reviews.title: Very useful canning set
customer_reviews.text: Love this set, was looking forever at garage sales to find a full canning kit, then voila just by chance was looking also for green mason jars (my kitchen is green and purple) and this kit fell into my cart...happy happy dance :)
customer_reviews.author: Raynebowe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good set, all tools work great and as intended. Must-buy, can't can without!
customer_reviews.author: Randy Puaatuua

customer_reviews.title: Feels a little cheap, but they do what I ...
customer_reviews.text: Feels a little cheap, but they do what I need them to do. I never would have realized how helpful the magnet would be if I didn't get this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Mc

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with this set
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this set! It worked out nicely and ended up being everything I needed for my canning project. It is a good deal for this kit!
customer_reviews.author: BJensen

customer_reviews.title: Great canning set.
customer_reviews.text: I waited to write this review because I wanted to get through a complete canning season before reviewing. Love this little canning set! It made everything easy peasy! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: angel87cat

customer_reviews.title: First time canner proof!
customer_reviews.text: I used this set for the first time and they worked like a charm! Everything worked perfectly and easily. Only draw back is the timer doesn't automatically shut off and I have to remove the batter to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Byers

customer_reviews.title: Great tools that are easy to clean and use
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, packaged well. Great tools that are easy to clean and use. Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chief1646

customer_reviews.title: Great help. This is a must
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about canning supplies. It went through this years canning season, and sure did well. Great help. This is a must, if you're going to do much canning.
customer_reviews.author: Midwesterner

customer_reviews.title: This is a great canning accessory set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great canning accessory set. My favorite piece is the timer, which has a magnet on the back. I admit, I use it more for the kid's time outs than for canning. lol
customer_reviews.author: ruth

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the cost
customer_reviews.text: This set it decent for the price. The funnel is thin but I had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Janene B Farley

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made, Does Not Hold Up
customer_reviews.text: This kit has all the necessary tools for home canning and the price point was right. However, you get what you pay for. I have only used it one time and the rubber/plastic coating on the jar gripper is cracking and pealing. It should not be doing this as the instrument is specifically to be used in grabbing the jars submerged in hot water and should be able to hold up against the high temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: I went back for seconds
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to canning so this offered all the tools I needed in one small package. It works so well I bought a second set to put away as a backup when I lose parts of the first set.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Canning Kit
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box I was a bit surprised to discover that this canning set is actually pretty good quality! Since I'm a novice canner I don't have any other kits to compare it to, but this is a nice one. The timer even comes with a battery! Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: this kit was perfect! I used every single tool
customer_reviews.text: My first attempt at canning.... this kit was perfect! I used every single tool. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Curry

customer_reviews.title: This kit is really a great buy and is of good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase, all items are as described, they are well made and I didn't even realize that it came with a timer...and...they included the batteries! I will likely be purchasing some as gifts...highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marmer

customer_reviews.title: good for the money
customer_reviews.text: But honestly most of hte stuff isn't necessary. We use the funnel and the jar gripper but the rest of the stuff the kids have been playing with and spreading all over the house. Fun colors tho - which is why the kids probalby like it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea N. Fleuren

customer_reviews.title: a great beginner kit
customer_reviews.text: i used this kit to make about 40 jars of blackberry jam this season. it worked great and should last me for many seasons to come. if you are going to need tools for really heavy use, you made need something more robust.
customer_reviews.author: pack howitzer

customer_reviews.title: The tools work like they should and their function is easily understood
customer_reviews.text: What's to review? The tools work like they should and their function is easily understood. Good set of tools for canning that everyone should have on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: This set gets the job done, is easy to clean in the dishwasher, and does not take up much storage space. It's my second set, came with the pressure canner, so between the two sets, I can handle most canning jobs.
customer_reviews.author: R. K. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Really great set!
customer_reviews.text: This set is good not only for the newbie but also the expert "Grandma" level of skill. I have two sets- 1 I use and the other is a back up. I have had that back up for quite some time now.... ;)
customer_reviews.author: LeAnn P

customer_reviews.title: It's OK. Median cost, median quality. I ...
customer_reviews.text: It's OK. Median cost,median quality. I am more of a casual canner so it fits my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and Practical!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! The color is just fantastic. It works as well as expected, all items are made pretty sturdy and the kit contains everything you need for canning except the pot and jars. The rubber/plastic is the better quality grade and not the typical rubber/plastic that cracks after going through extreme temperature changes. Looks like it will hold up well, except the digital clock. The timer is a little cheesy and cheaply made, but will get you through a season or two of canning. The other pieces will likely last much longer, if proper care is used.
customer_reviews.author: Mz_Muhammad

customer_reviews.title: I remember the day...
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't an ardent canner but years ago I used to make jellies and jams. Back then, I didn't have all these "fancy" items to help me and it sure was a pain (literally) using tongs, etc. to get lids out of hot water or handling hot jars...Back then of course, we didn't have Amazon and while others might have been able to get these items in stores, in my "remote" location, it most probably would not have been possible. Thanks, Amazon--and of course, Presto for making an affordable set available...Now I can once a week.
customer_reviews.author: lee

customer_reviews.title: Great canning set
customer_reviews.text: I'm really glad I got this kit. I've been doing my canning the hard way, using whatever I had in the kitchen to get the jars in and out of the water bath, getting air bubbles out & getting the lids out of the hot water. This will make it much easier and probably faster. My only disappointment is that the timer doesn't have a power button. I'm not sure I'll use it at all if I have to keep putting the battery back in every time I decide to can.
customer_reviews.author: gwenny j

customer_reviews.title: Good Basic set of canning tools.
customer_reviews.text: Can't say much more than these are essential items to begin canning. This is my second set and couldn't ask for better.
customer_reviews.author: David E Mevis

customer_reviews.title: I got this kit along with the Mirro 92122A Polished ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this kit along with the Mirro 92122A Polished Aluminum Pressure Cooker and the two together made canning a breeze. Buy both!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Basic is here
customer_reviews.text: It will do the job and not cost you for a fancy name brand. Add to the fact that you are saving money by canning... you have been good to yourself! recommended for the starter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the starter canner. I have used them about 4-5 times so far and they are working great!
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Must Have Canning Tools
customer_reviews.text: These canning tools are an absolute must-have for anyone preparing to preserve food through canning. I've canned before and used them, but after moving, most of my tools were lost. So, this was a replacement set for me and they didn't let me down. I liked the wide funnel better than my former funnel, which took much longer to get food into the jars. This set has a few things my old set didn't come with such as the timer, tongs, and jar tightener. However, those are also very useful tools and nice to have all together in one kit. I would recommend this to anyone who is preparing to can, beginners or seasoned food preservers alike.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Casey

customer_reviews.title: Worthy purchase
customer_reviews.text: Only used once but so essential to canning and made this mornings jam making a real breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Senior

customer_reviews.title: This set works so well when canning. It helps ...
customer_reviews.text: This set works so well when canning. It helps get the lids out of the hot water without burning your fingers and it is so much easier to remove the filled jars from the water canner.
customer_reviews.author: D.M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: I would give the items I use 5/5 stars I just don't find everything in this kit necessary for my canning. I can two days a week and all the items still look like new. Definitely built tough. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Busy mom

customer_reviews.title: Complete your set.
customer_reviews.text: Does everything it is designed to do and all was needed to complete my canning activity.

customer_reviews.text: these tools make canning soo much easier !! I got all my items pictured and I couldn't be happier to start canning more!

customer_reviews.title: the tongs work great.
customer_reviews.text: The timer in this package doesn't work. You need to press Min and Sec to Clear. Unfortunately, the Min. button does nothing. Otherwise, the tongs work great.

customer_reviews.title: Canning kit
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to canning and bought a pressure cooker the same time I bought this although I see no real use for the tongs or the gripper and didn't need the timer either.

customer_reviews.text: This kit had everything I needed to try canning for the first time. So glad I ordered it!

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: All the accessories you need to go with your canning basket. These are easy to use, and the color makes them easy to see in my collection of kitchen gadgets.
customer_reviews.author: azneongirl

customer_reviews.title: Great Beginning Canning Kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great beginning canning kit though you can probably do without a few of the items. I've found the jar lifters and the magnetic lid lifter the most helpful. I've used it several times and no complaints so far. Great value
customer_reviews.author: ely

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Performs as advertised, good value. The timer is a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: eangler

product_meta.title: Presto 7 Function Canning Kit
product_meta.description: Handy tools for easy home canning! This 7-function accessory kit includes a digital timer, canning funnel, combination bubble remover/magnetic lid lifter, jar lifter, kitchen tongs, and jar wrench. The digital timer, with battery included, accurately counts down processing times from any time up to 99 minutes and 59 seconds. Counts up for use as a stopwatch too! Timer features a large digital display with a clip, easel stand, and magnet on back for convenient use. The canning funnel assures easy and neat filling of regular or wide-mouth canning jars. The flat end of the combination bubble remover/magnetic lid lifter gently releases trapped air bubbles from liquid in jars. Use the magnetic end to assist in lifting canning lids from hot water. Jar lifter helps to place jars in canner before processing and then safely and easily removes hot jars after processing. Kitchen tongs provide safe handling of hot foods for canning. Jar wrench helps to remove screw bands that have become stuck in place during processing.
feature_bullets: Funnel for filling regular and wide mouth canning jars
Bubble remover for releasing trapped air bubbles
Magnetic lid lifter removes canning lids from hot water
Kitchen tongs for easy handling of hot foods for canning
Jar lifter easily removes hot jars from canner Jar wrench helps to remove sticky screw bands
